CustomField.description: This field is optional and manually populated by administrators. This field allows for overflow of the Connection Role field and concatenates to form one long parameter if needed. This field is used to specify which connection roles to use when calculating exposure. This field is a comma-delineated list with no spaces. Default is null.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field allows for overflow of the Connection Role field and concatenates to form one long parameter if needed.
CustomField.label: Connection Role 2
